title: 我安装flan‘s mod 后崩溃了？！求助
author: Dannyzy
txt_content:
打开会显示如下：求解！！！！急！
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game

A full error report has been saved to C:\Minecraft 1.5.1 扩展整合\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-05-11_12.46.44-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

replies.author: Atamisun_
replies.txt_content:
跟其他Mod衝突到了
請移掉{:10_493:}
